comments:
Build ID: I20070525-1350

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Start Eclipse
2. Sometimes error log view immediately shows two errors, first one with message "An unexpected runtime error has occurred.", second one with empty message.

Stack trace:
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.eventmgr.EventManager.dispatchEvent(EventManager.java:195)

More information:
eclipse.buildId=I20070525-1350
java.version=1.6.0
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=de_DE

This error could not be reproduced always, but if it happens, then only during startup process.
